breakpoints.description: Breakpoints values, only applicable when type="container" is set, ignored when type is not set or type="media" is set.
breakpoints.description_zh: 断点值，仅在设置了 type=“container” 时适用，在未设置 type 或设置了 type=“media” 时忽略。

columns.description: Number of columns in each row, 12 by default

grow.description: Determines whether columns in the last row should expand to fill all available space, false by default
grow.description_zh: 确定最后一行中的列是否应扩展以填充所有可用空间，默认情况下为 false

gutter.description: Gutter between columns, key of theme.spacing or any valid CSS value, 'md' by default
gutter.description_zh: 列之间的装订线，theme.spacing 的键或任何有效的 CSS 值，默认为 'md'

overflow.description: Sets overflow CSS property on the root element, 'visible' by default
overflow.description_zh: 在根元素上设置 overflow CSS 属性，默认为 'visible'

type.description: Determines typeof of queries that are used for responsive styles, 'media' by default
type.description_zh: 确定用于响应式样式的查询类型，默认为 'media'
